title: Internet service provider market share in Australia fourth quarter 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Telecommunications Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
There is a difference of 35.3 between the maximum Telecommunications Company Telstra and minimum Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
min_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Telecommunications Company, and Market share in each Telecommunications Company on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Telecommunications Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is appeared to be the highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
There is a difference of 35.3 between the maximum Telecommunications Company Telstra and minimum Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Telecommunications Company in the x axis and Market share in the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Telecommunications Company Telstra and lowest at Telecommunications Company Australia Other.
The Market share of Telecommunications Company Australia Other is 4.21% smaller than the maximum value at Telstra.
Market share at Telecommunications Company Telstra is 46.3 , second place is Optus at 15.9, and thirdly is iiNet at 15.1.
The lowest value 11.0 at Australia Other is almost 2.32 times smaller than the average value 19.98.
Summing up the values of all Telecommunications Companys, we get total 99.9.
